explains: v. 获得……票（poll 的 ing 形式）

sentences.en: Polling has been heavy since 8 a.m.
sentences.cn: 从早上8点以来投票很踊跃。

sentences.en: He walked to the local polling place to cast his vote.
sentences.cn: 他走到当地的投票点去投票。

sentences.en: There has been a busy start to polling in today's local elections.
sentences.cn: 今天地方选举开始时投票就非常踊跃。
